item.title: Lessons Learned Mentoring
item.author: tlark
item.description: Mentoring: A Year in Review Last week I met our intern in person for the first time. They had started with us during the COVID-19 pandemic, so everyone was still working from home. I took them out for lunch, gave them some company swag, and said my goodbyes. Our intern has been with us for an entire year, and they are now leaving to go to college. My employer partners with a local program that helps under privileged Bay Area high school kids get a real world job experience.
